item.name: Don't remap keyboards which has third vendor's driver
Don't remap pointing devices which has third vendor's driver
Enable CapsLock LED Hack
item.appendix: (Keep LED on to prevent a delay of CapsLock at some Apple's keyboard)

item.name: Pass-Through CapsLock LED status
item.appendix: (Don't enable this when you use "XXX to CapsLock")

item.name: Don't show Modifier lock status on screen
Don't restore modifiers in the mouse event
item.appendix: For example, when you use Option+Tab to Command+Tab,
we send "Command+Click" when you did a mouse click while
pushing the Option key after you pushed Option+Tab.
"Option+Click" should be output, but this option changes this behavior.

item.name: Disable NumPad Hack
item.appendix: (Don't change Fn+JKL.. to NumPad, and other Fn+key combinations)

item.name: Pass Through Mode (Disable all settings temporarily)
What is Pass Through Mode?
item.appendix: You can disable all settings temporarily.
Turn on a setting below, and toggle "Pass Through Mode".

item.name: Change Fn+Escape to toggle "Pass Through Mode"
Simultaneous Key Presses [Escape+Tab] to toggle "Pass Through Mode"
Holding Escape to toggle "Pass Through Mode"
We can scroll pages by moving the mouse pointer.
item.appendix: (Also, you can generate a click event if you click without moving)

item.name: MiddleClick to Control+F4 (= Move focus to active or next window)
LeftClick to F12 (only in MacBookPro2,1 Trackpad)
Swap Shift_L and CapsLock on the Mac's internal kbd (vid/pid: 0x05ac,0x0218)
item.appendix: (*Note: I have set PCKeyboardHack to remap CapsLock to ExposeAll on all kbds*)
(ExposeAll to Shift_L and Shift_L to CapsLock on the MacBook's internal keyboard)
(ExposeAll back to CapsLock on other devices)

item.name: Revert CapsLock to normal on every kbds
item.appendix: (*Note: I have set PCKeyboardHack to remap CapsLock to ExposeAll on all kbds*)

item.name: What's Mouse Keys Mode?
item.appendix: Push "S" and "D" keys simultaneously while pressing Command key,
Then you can control mouse cursor by HJKL keys. (and Arrow keys)
- Arrow Keys to move mouse cursor

item.name: Simultaneous Key Presses Command+[S+D] to turn on Mouse Keys Mode
item.appendix: // Press S,D keys simultaneously while pressing Command_L or Command_R.
// You can release Command key while pressing S,D keys.

item.name: Simultaneous Key Presses [D+F] to turn on Mouse Keys Mode
Simultaneous Key Presses [X+C] to turn on Mouse Keys Mode
[Option] JIS_EISUU to LeftClick
item.appendix: // If you are using Apple keyboards, this setting may be useless.
// Because Apple keyboards have a 2-key rollover problem,
// and can't recognize JIS_EISUU while pressing S,D keys.

item.name: What's Complete Vi Mode?
item.appendix: You can use Vi style navigation on any applications when "Complete Vi Mode" is on.
Turn on a setting below, and toggle "Complete Vi Mode".
It is a list of the operation.
- / to Command_L+F (+ turn off Vi Mode)
- i to turn off Vi Mode

block.autogen: --KeyToKey-- KeyCode::W, KeyCode::CURSOR_RIGHT, ModifierFlag::OPTION_L, KeyCode::CURSOR_RIGHT, ModifierFlag::OPTION_L, KeyCode::CURSOR_LEFT, ModifierFlag::OPTION_L

item.name: What's Expose Mode?
item.appendix: This makes it easy to use Expose.
You can do Expose by an alphabet key instead of F8,F9,..,F12 keys.
- F to Move focus to active or next window (Control+F4)

item.name: Simultaneous Key Presses [K+L] to toggle Expose Mode
What's Cmd+Tab Mode?
item.appendix: This makes it easy to use Command+Tab.

item.name: Simultaneous Key Presses [Tab+Q] to toggle Cmd+Tab
Use Command_R+[ASD FGH JKL] for Spaces
Use Command_R+[123 QWE ASD] for Spaces (3x3)
Use Command_R+[123 QWE ASD] for Spaces (4x4)
Use Command_R+[QWE ASD ZXC] for Spaces (3x3)
Use Command_R+[QWE ASD ZXC] for Spaces (3x3)
Use FN+[WER SDF XCV] for Spaces (3x3)
Use Fn+[1234 QWER ASDF ZXCV] for Spaces (4x4)
Use Fn+[7890 UIOP JKL; M,./] for Spaces (4x4)
Use Option_R+[WER SDF XCV] for Spaces (3x3)
Enable at only VMware Fusion, Parallels Desktop
Change Command_L Keys
item.appendix: (To support Emacs on Fusion. This allows controlling individual key translations)

item.name: Change Command_L to Option_L
item.appendix: (Option_L is translated to Alt_L by Fusion)

item.name: Change Command_L+X to Control+X
item.appendix: (Leave it unchecked for using left Meta+X in Emacs on Fusion)

item.name: Change Command_R Keys
item.appendix: (To support Emacs on Fusion. This allows controlling individual key translations)

item.name: Change Command_R+X to Control+X
item.appendix: (Leave it unchecked for using right Meta+X in Emacs on Fusion)

item.name: Use F2 to Rename (Use Tab to complete Rename)
Use Forward Delete as Delete Files
Return Key Opens a file
item.appendix: (use F2 to rename but caution not to use Return when done typing name or file opens)

item.name: Use Quote (') to go UP a directory (' to Ctrl+Up)
Use Semicolon to go Back in history (; to Ctrl+[)
Use { to select next file (i.e. up arrow key) ({ to Up-Arrow)
Use } to select previous file (i.e. down arrow key) (} to Down-Arrow)
Use [ to collapse folder (i.e. left key) ([ to Left-Arrow)
Use ] to expand folder (i.e. left key) (] to Left-Arrow)
Fix Home/End
item.appendix: (Home/End move to beg/end of line, Ctl/Cmd+Home/End move to beg/end of page)

Application Key to Command_L

--KeyToKey-- KeyCode::JIS_YEN, VK_SHIFT | ModifierFlag::NONE, KeyCode::JIS_YEN, ModifierFlag::OPTION_L | ModifierFlag::SHIFT_L

item.name: EISUU x2 to EISUU (単発での英数キーは無視する)
Use Windows Kana-Input Layout on ASCII Keyboard
Simultaneous Key Presses [EISUU+KANA] to toggle Vi Mode
Simultaneous Key Presses [EISUU+KANA] to Return
item.appendix: (We can change the key once again)

item.name: Hack for the bug of Mac OS X
Disable Command/Control/Option/Shift+EISUU, Command/Control/Option/Shift+KANA
item.appendix: (to prevent the system hangup at Snow Leopard)

item.appendix: (+ When you type Command_R only, change inputmode to russian)

item.appendix: (+ When you type Shift_L only, change inputmode to english)

change inputmode to "English - Ilya Birman Typography".)

item.appendix: (+ When you type Shift_R only, change inputmode to russian)

item.name: Improve UK Keyboard Layout
item.appendix: ( '\' to additional Enter, '§' to '`' and '`' to '\' )

item.name: Section(§) to Option_L+3 (#), Shift+Section(§) to Tilde(~)
Backslash(\) to Option_L+3 (#), Shift+Backslash(\) to Tilde(~)
